meanings.definition: The plural form of scrotum, the pouch of skin containing the testicles.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined his scrota carefully during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: He winced in pain after accidentally hitting his scrota.
meanings.sent3: The scrota on the anatomy model looked quite realistic.
meanings.sent4: His scrota felt like delicate pouches holding precious cargo.
meanings.sent5: The boxer protected his scrota with a sturdy cup during the match.

meanings.sent1: He joked with his friends about getting kicked in the scrota.
meanings.sent2: The comedian made a hilarious reference to his scrota in the stand-up show.
meanings.sent3: The scrota comment caught everyone off guard with its unexpected humor.
meanings.sent4: His scrota felt like two tiny marbles in his pocket.
meanings.sent5: The athlete felt a sharp pain in his scrota after the intense workout.
